00009 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00010 Langaus::Langaus(const double* fitrange,const double* startValues,const double* parlimitslo, const double* parlimitshi, bool useFFT){
00011 
00012     RooRealVar    *t      = new RooRealVar("t","t",fitrange[0],fitrange[1]);
00013     RooRealVar    *mg     = new RooRealVar("mg","mg",0);
00014     RooRealVar    *sg     = new RooRealVar("sg","sg",startValues[2],parlimitslo[2],parlimitshi[2]);
00015     RooRealVar    *ml     = new RooRealVar("ml","mean landau",startValues[1],parlimitslo[1],parlimitshi[1]);
00016     RooRealVar    *sl     = new RooRealVar("sl","sigma landau",startValues[0],parlimitslo[0],parlimitshi[0]);
00017     //RooRealVar * mp=new RooRealVar("mp","mean poisson",startValues[1],parlimitslo[1],parlimitshi[1]);
00018 
00019     RooLandau     *landau = new RooLandau("landau","landau",*t,*ml,*sl);
00020     RooGaussian   *gauss  = new RooGaussian("gaus","gaus",*t,*mg,*sg);
00021     //RooPoisson * poisson=new RooPoisson("poisson","poisson",*t,*mp);
00022 
00023     //RooNumConvPdf * gxp=new RooNumConvPdf("gxp","poisson (x) gauss", *t,*poisson, *gauss);
00024 
00025     RooFFTConvPdf *lxg    = new RooFFTConvPdf("lxg","lxg",*t,*landau,*gauss,2);
00026     RooNumConvPdf *lxgNum = new RooNumConvPdf("lxgNum","lxgNum",*t,*landau,*gauss);
00027 
00028     //RooFFTConvPdf* lxg=new RooFFTConvPdf("lxg","landau (X) gauss (X) poisson", *t, *landau, *(dynamic_cast<RooAbsPdf*>(gxp)),2);
00029 
00030     lxg->setCacheObservables(*t);
00031 
00032     _t=t, _mg=mg, _sg=sg, _ml=ml, _sl=sl, _landau=landau, _gauss=gauss, _lxg=lxg, _lxgNum=lxgNum;
00033     _fitrange=fitrange, _startValues=startValues, _parlimitslo=parlimitslo, _parlimitshi=parlimitshi;
00034     _var=_lxg->getVariables(); 
00035     _data=0,_r=0;
00036     _peak=0, _ePeak=0;
00037     _useFFT=useFFT;
00038 
00039     _lxgNum->convIntConfig().setEpsRel(EPS_REL);
00040     _lxgNum->convIntConfig().setEpsAbs(EPS_ABS);
00041     
00042 };

00044 Langaus::~Langaus(){
00045     std::cout<<"Destructor of object Langaus"<<'\n';
00046     delete _t;
00047     delete _mg;
00048     delete _sg;
00049     delete _ml;
00050     delete _sl;
00051     delete _landau;
00052     delete _gauss;
00053     delete _lxg;
00054     delete _lxgNum;
00055     if(_data!=0) delete _data;
00056 }

00072 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00073 Langaus& Langaus::setData(TH1* h){
00074     if (_data!=0){ 
00075         delete _data;
00076     }
00077     _data = new RooDataHist("data","data for t",*_t,h);
00078     return *this;
00079 }
00080 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00081 RooDataHist* Langaus::getData(){
00082     if (_data==0){
00083         throw runtime_error("No data.");
00084     }
00085     return _data;
00086 }
00087 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00088 double Langaus::getChiSquare(){
00089     RooPlot* frame = _t->frame(Name("frame"),Title("frame"));
00090     _data->plotOn(frame) ;
00091     _lxg->plotOn(frame) ;
00092     return frame->chiSquare(0);
00093 }
00094 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00095 double Langaus::findPeak(){
00096 
00097     double  value  = 0;
00098     double  xvalue = 0;
00099 
00100     RooRealVar* t=new RooRealVar("t","t",_t->getMin(),_t->getMax());
00101     if(_useFFT==1){
00102 
00103         int i=0;
00104         t->setBins(FFT_CACHE,"cache");
00105 
00106         RooFFTConvPdf* lxg=new RooFFTConvPdf("lxg","landau (X) gauss",*t,*_landau,*_gauss) ;
00107         RooDataHist* lxgcache=lxg->getCacheHist(RooArgSet(*t));
00108 
00109         t= (RooRealVar*)lxgcache->get()->find("t");
00110         lxgcache=lxg->getCacheHist(RooArgSet(*t));
00111 
00112         i=0;
00113         lxgcache->get(i);
00114         value=lxgcache->weight();
00115         xvalue=t->getVal();
00116 
00117         while(i<lxgcache->numEntries()){
00118 
00119             lxgcache->get(i);
00120             if(value<lxgcache->weight()) value=lxgcache->weight() ,xvalue=t->getVal();
00121             ++i;
00122         }
00123         delete lxg;
00124     }else{
00125         RooNumConvPdf* lxg=new RooNumConvPdf("lxg","landau (X) gauss",*t,*_landau,*_gauss) ;
00126 
00127         double tempvalue=0;
00128         double xScale[2]={_t->getMin(),_t->getMax()};
00129 
00130         /*  find peak maximum */
00131         for ( int i=0;i<NUM_SAMPLING;++i ) {
00132             t->setVal(xScale[0]+(float(i)/(float)NUM_SAMPLING)*(xScale[1]-xScale[0]));
00133             tempvalue=lxg->evaluate();
00134             if(value<tempvalue) value=tempvalue, xvalue=t->getVal();
00135         }
00136 
00137         double tempRange=0;
00138         (xvalue-xScale[0])<(xScale[1]-xvalue)? tempRange=xvalue-xScale[0] : tempRange=xScale[1]-xvalue;
00139 
00140         /*  repeat until precision given by NUM_RATIO is reached */
00141         while(tempRange/float(NUM_SAMPLING)/abs(xScale[0]-xScale[1])>NUM_RATIO ){
00142             for ( int i=0;i<NUM_SAMPLING;++i ) {
00143                 t->setVal(xvalue-tempRange+(float(i)/(float)NUM_SAMPLING)*2*tempRange);
00144                 tempvalue=lxg->evaluate();
00145                 if(value<tempvalue) value=tempvalue, xvalue=t->getVal();
00146             }
00147             tempRange/=2.;
00148         }
00149         delete lxg;
00150     }
00151 
00152     printf("Peak:%.2f\n",xvalue);
00153     _peak=xvalue;
00154     return xvalue ;
00155 }
00156 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00157 double Langaus::findPeak(const double* par){
00158 
00159     RooArgSet* var=0;
00160     if(_useFFT==0){    
00161         var=_lxg->getVariables();
00162     }else{
00163         var=_lxgNum->getVariables();
00164     }
00165     RooRealVar* t  = (RooRealVar*)var->find("t");
00166     RooRealVar* ml = (RooRealVar*)var->find("ml");
00167     RooRealVar* sl = (RooRealVar*)var->find("sl");
00168     RooRealVar* sg = (RooRealVar*)var->find("sg");
00169 
00170     ml->setVal(par[0]);
00171     sl->setVal(par[1]);
00172     sg->setVal(par[2]);
00173     //var->Print("v");
00174 
00175     double  value  = 0;
00176     double  xvalue = 0;
00177 
00178 
00179     if(_useFFT==1){
00180         int     i      = 0;
00181 
00182         RooDataHist* lxgcache=_lxg->getCacheHist(RooArgSet(*_t));
00183 
00184         t        = (RooRealVar*)lxgcache->get()->find("t");
00185         lxgcache = _lxg->getCacheHist(RooArgSet(*t));
00186         i        = 0;
00187         lxgcache->get(i);
00188         value    = lxgcache->weight();
00189         xvalue   = t->getVal();
00190 
00191         while(i<lxgcache->numEntries()){
00192             lxgcache->get(i);
00193             if(value<lxgcache->weight()) value=lxgcache->weight() ,xvalue=t->getVal();
00194             ++i;
00195         }
00196     }else{
00197         RooRealVar* t=new RooRealVar("t","t",_t->getMin(),_t->getMax());
00198         RooNumConvPdf* lxg=new RooNumConvPdf("lxg","landau (X) gauss",*t,*_landau,*_gauss) ;
00199 
00200 
00201         double tempvalue=0;
00202         double xScale[2]={_t->getMin(),_t->getMax()};
00203 
00204         /*  find peak maximum */
00205         for ( int i=0;i<NUM_SAMPLING;++i ) {
00206             t->setVal(xScale[0]+(float(i)/(float)NUM_SAMPLING)*(xScale[1]-xScale[0]));
00207             tempvalue=lxg->evaluate();
00208             if(value<tempvalue) value=tempvalue, xvalue=t->getVal();
00209         }
00210 
00211         double tempRange=0;
00212         (xvalue-xScale[0])<(xScale[1]-xvalue)? tempRange=xvalue-xScale[0] : tempRange=xScale[1]-xvalue;
00213 
00214         /*  repeat until precision given by NUM_RATIO is reached */
00215         while(tempRange/float(NUM_SAMPLING)/abs(xScale[0]-xScale[1])>NUM_RATIO ){
00216             for ( int i=0;i<NUM_SAMPLING;++i ) {
00217                 t->setVal(xvalue-tempRange+(float(i)/(float)NUM_SAMPLING)*2*tempRange);
00218                 tempvalue=lxg->evaluate();
00219                 if(value<tempvalue) value=tempvalue, xvalue=t->getVal();
00220             }
00221             tempRange/=2.;
00222         }
00223 
00224 
00225 
00226         delete lxg;
00227         delete t;
00228     }
00229 
00230     printf("Peak: %.2f\n",xvalue);
00231     return xvalue;
00232 }
00233 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00234 double Langaus::findePeak(){
00235 
00236 
00237     double par[3],epar[3];
00238     par[0]  = _ml->getVal();
00239     par[1]  = _sl->getVal();
00240     par[2]  = _sg->getVal();
00241     epar[0] = _ml->getError();
00242     epar[1] = _sl->getError();
00243     epar[2] = _sg->getError();
00244 
00245     if(_peak==0) _peak=findPeak();
00246     double derivates[3];
00247     for(int i=0;i<3;++i) derivates[i]=0;
00248     double step;
00249 
00250     int count;
00251     for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
00252         step=0.01*par[i];
00253         if(epar[i]/par[i]>0.01) step=epar[i]/4.0;
00254         count=0;
00255         do{ 
00256             ++count;
00257 
00258             par[i]+=step;
00259             derivates[i]=(findPeak(par)-_peak)/step;
00260             par[i]-=step; 
00261 
00262             if(par[i]-step>0&&i!=2){
00263                 par[i]-=step;
00264                 derivates[i]=(derivates[i]+(_peak-findPeak(par))/step)/2;
00265                 par[i]+=step;
00266             } 
00267             else{               
00268                 //derivates[i]=0;
00269             }
00270             if(i==2){
00271                 par[i]-=step;
00272                 derivates[i]=(derivates[i]+(_peak-findPeak(par))/step)/2;
00273                 par[i]+=step;
00274             }
00275             if(derivates[i]==0) ++step;
00276         }while(derivates[i]==0&&count<20);
00277     }
00278     findPeak(par);
00279 
00280     double error=0;
00281     double cor[3][3];
00282     cor[1][2] = _r->correlation("sl","sg");
00283     cor[0][1] = _r->correlation("ml","sl");
00284     cor[0][2] = _r->correlation("ml","sg");
00285     cor[2][1] = cor[1][2],cor[1][0] = cor[0][1],cor[2][0] = cor[0][2];
00286     for( int i=0;i<3;i++) cor[i][i]=1;
00287 
00288     for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
00289         for(int j=0;j<3;j++){
00290             error+=derivates[i]*cor[i][j]*derivates[j]*epar[i]*epar[j];    
00291         }
00292     }
00293     if(error<0){
00294         throw "Not positive definite correlation matrix";
00295     }
00296     error=sqrt(error);
00297 
00298     printf("peak:\t %.2f +- %.2f\n",_peak,error);
00299 
00300     _ePeak=error;
00301     return error;
00302 }
00303 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00304 RooFitResult* Langaus::Fit(void){
00305     if(_useFFT==1){
00306         _r= _lxg->fitTo(*_data, Range(_fitrange[0],_fitrange[1]),Strategy(1),Save()) ;
00307         printf("Minimum of -log(L):\t%3.f\n",_r->minNll());
00308         _logL=_r->minNll();
00309     }else{
00310         _lxgNum->setConvolutionWindow(*(RooAbsReal*)_mg,*(RooAbsReal*)_sg ,100.);
00311         _r= _lxgNum->fitTo(*_data, Range(_fitrange[0],_fitrange[1]),Strategy(1),Save()) ;
00312     }
00313 
00314     _mlerror = _ml->getError();
00315     _slerror = _sl->getError();
00316     _sgerror = _sg->getError();
00317     return _r;
00318 }
00319 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00320 void Langaus::langaufit( const TH1* h, double* fitparams, double* fiterrors,double& peak,double& epeak){
00321     
00322         ((RooRealVar*)this->getT())->setBins(FFT_CACHE,"cache");
00323    
00324     this->setData((TH1*)h);
00325     this->Fit(); 
00326     // Construct landau (x) gauss    (fast fourier transformation)
00327 
00328     //m.setStrategy(2);
00329     //m.fit("m");
00330     //m.migrad();
00331     //m.hesse();
00332     //m.migrad();
00333     //m.minos();
00334 
00335     //retrieve values of observables
00336     fitparams[0] = this->getSl()->getVal();
00337     fitparams[1] = this->getMl()->getVal();
00338     fitparams[2] = this->getSg()->getVal();
00339     //retrieve values for errors of observables
00340     fiterrors[0] = this->getSlerror();
00341     fiterrors[1] = this->getMlerror();
00342     fiterrors[2] = this->getSgerror();
00343     
00344     peak=findPeak();
00345     printf("----estimation of peak error--------\n");
00346     epeak=findePeak();
00347 }
00348 //___________________________________________________________________________________________
00349 double Langaus::getCorrelation(const char* first,const char* second){
00350     if(_r->correlation(first,second)==0){
00351         printf("Arguments for Langaus::getCorrelation(const char*, const char*):\n"
00352                 "\tml(Landau mean), sl(Landau sigma), sg(Gaus sigma)\n");
00353         return 0;
00354     }else{
00355         return _r->correlation(first,second);
00356     }
00357 }
